author: Casey Newton
title: How Facebook’s pandemic relief efforts could be undermined by its own user base
description: Nearly a million people have joined Facebook groups advocating the protest of legal stay-at-home orders
content:
Illustration by Alex Castro / The Verge

 Thanks to the Morning Brew for recommending us as an “Essential” read. Here’s hoping all of you who signed up over the weekend find The Interface a useful guide to tech, democracy, and the pandemic.
